dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 3495 IH: Women’s Public Health and Safety Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Duffy introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to allow for greater State flexibility with respect to excluding providers who are involved in abortions.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Women’s Public Health and Safety Act.

section.header: Increasing State flexibility in excluding providers who are involved in abortions
section.text: Section 1902(a)(23) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1396a(a)(23)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking or by a provider or supplier and inserting , by a provider or supplier; and
by inserting before the semicolon at the end , or by any individual or entity based on the individual’s or entity’s involvement in abortions.
